## CoPilot

-  Code completion within RStudio
- Write a comment, coPilot writes the code
- Context aware - uses the packages you have loaded

Can make coding faster (but code can be bad!)

## Setting up CoPilot

1) Make a github account on [github.com](github.com)
2) Sign up for Copilot (free with an an educational license [github.com/education](https://github.com/education/))
3) In RStudio, go to Tools -> Global Options -> Copilot -> Enable copilot
4) Press <kbd>tab</kbd> to accept CoPilot suggestions
5) Use <kbd>ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>space</kbd> to see RStudio autocomplete suggestions
